content: this aran dog sweater knitting pattern is a smart knit sweater that beautifully combines functionality with the timeless charm of irish culture featuring authentic aran stitches such as intricate cables and irish moss stitch this design offers a great-fitting sweater for dogs of all sizes the yarn i used for this design is available in a range of colors you can easily personalize the look to suit your dog s style while still capturing the essence of traditional aran knitwear it s a great addition to your pet s wardrobe offering both warmth and a stylish nod to a rich knitting heritage yarn any bulky/chunky/12 ply yarn that can be matched with 6 5 mm us 10 5 needles i used lionbrand hue and me yarn 125g/137 yds/125m you need approx small - 2 274 yds medium - 2 274yds large - 3 411 yds needles 6 5 mm us 10 5 circular knitting needles - use a 24 or 32 cable skills level intermediate this is an intermediate knitting pattern and the techniques involved are increasing and decreasing cable stitches sizing the instructions are for small medium and large dogs width of chest at widest point s 7-8 inches / m 10-12 inches / l 15-16 inches circumference of chest/body s - 14/16 inches / m - 20/24 inches / l - 30/32 inches length of back excluding the collar s 12 inches / m 16 inches / l 18 inches
